column1: “The above expression in Section 29(D) is of similar import as “shall not be called in question in
any Court”, contained in Section 22 of the Interpretation Ordinance. Hence, we agree with the
submissions made by the learned President’s Counsel on behalf of the Defendant-Petitioner that
the said resolution (marked E) passed by the Board of Directors of the People’s Bank, cannot be
invalidated or challenged in an action in the District Court. Therefore, in these circumstances,
the sale of the mortgaged property by public auction upon the said resolution marked E cannot
be restrained by an interim injunction.”
